medications.name: BPC-157
medications.description: BPC-157 Therapy offers cutting-edge treatment designed to support healing, recovery, and overall wellness.
medications.indication: BPC-157 therapy promotes tissue repair, reduces inflammation, and enhances recovery from injuries or physical strain.

medications.name: Hexarelin
medications.description: Hexarelin is a peptide designed to stimulate the release of growth hormone, promoting muscle growth, fat reduction, and faster recovery. With its potent regenerative effects, Hexarelin is a versatile peptide for those seeking improved physical performance and resilience.
medications.indication: Hexarelin strengthens connective tissues, supports joint health, and may improve cardiovascular function by promoting cardiac repair and protection. Known for its ability to enhance strength and energy, Hexarelin is commonly used for anti-aging, athletic performance, and injury recovery.

medications.name: TB-400 / TB-500
medications.description: TB-400/500 is a synthetic fragment of thymosin beta-4 (specifically the 17-23 segment), designed to replicate its active region. Both are involved in actin regulation and tissue repair. TB-500 Therapy provides advanced treatment designed to enhance recovery, promote healing, and support overall physical performance.
medications.indication: TB-400/500 therapy helps reduce inflammation, accelerate tissue repair, and improve endurance, making it an ideal choice for those seeking optimal recovery and resilience.

medications.name: Tesamorelin
medications.description: A peptide therapy that boosts natural growth hormone production.
medications.indication: Achieve targeted fat loss and enhanced metabolic health with Tesamorelin. Known for its ability to reduce stubborn visceral fat, it supports improved body composition, muscle definition, and energy.

tests.name: GI-MAP + Zonulin
tests.description: An advanced stool test providing a comprehensive assessment of gut microbiome health, including pathogens, inflammation markers, and intestinal permeability (zonulin).
tests.indication: Ideal for those addressing gut issues, digestive health, or immune function concerns.

tests.name: DUTCH Complete™ Test
tests.description: The DUTCH Complete™ Test (Dried Urine Test for Comprehensive Hormones) is an advanced hormone panel that provides a detailed analysis of sex hormones, adrenal function, and their metabolites. Using dried urine samples collected over a 24-hour period, this test offers a comprehensive assessment of hormonal balance, metabolism, and overall endocrine health. It measures cortisol patterns, sex hormones, melatonin, and organic acid markers to provide insights into stress response, hormone detoxification, and overall well-being.
tests.indication: The DUTCH Complete™ Test is indicated for individuals experiencing symptoms related to hormone imbalance, adrenal dysfunction, and metabolic concerns, including fatigue, mood swings, weight fluctuations, irregular menstrual cycles, low libido, and sleep disturbances. It is particularly beneficial for assessing adrenal health, evaluating estrogen metabolism, and monitoring hormone therapy. This test provides actionable insights for optimizing hormonal balance, improving stress resilience, and enhancing overall wellness.

tests.name: DUTCH Cycle Mapping Panel
tests.description: A comprehensive hormone test that tracks fluctuations throughout the menstrual cycle, offering insights into estrogen and progesterone patterns.
tests.indication: Ideal for those addressing irregular cycles, fertility concerns, or hormonal imbalances.

tests.name: GI-MAP + Zonulin
tests.description: An advanced stool test providing a comprehensive assessment of gut microbiome health, including pathogens, inflammation markers, and intestinal permeability (zonulin).
tests.indication: Ideal for those addressing gut issues, digestive health, or immune function concerns.

tests.indication: Ideal for those addressing irregular cycles, fertility concerns, or hormonal imbalances.

medications.name: Glutathione
medications.description: Glutathione is a powerful antioxidant naturally produced in the body that plays a crucial role in detoxification, immune function, and cellular repair. It neutralizes harmful free radicals, reduces oxidative stress, and supports liver health, making it essential for overall wellness and anti-aging.
medications.indication: Glutathione helps brighten skin tone, reduce inflammation, and enhance recovery from physical stress. Widely studied for its benefits, it is a cornerstone of cellular defense and optimal health.

medications.name: Low Dose Naltrexone (LDN)
medications.description: Low Dose Naltrexone (LDN) is a compounded formulation of naltrexone, an opioid receptor antagonist, typically dosed between 0.5 mg and 4.5 mg. Unlike standard naltrexone dosing used for addiction treatment, LDN works by transiently blocking opioid receptors, leading to a rebound increase in endogenous endorphin and enkephalin production. This modulation of the immune system and inflammation pathways has shown therapeutic benefits in a range of chronic conditions.
medications.indication: Indicated for the management of autoimmune disorders, chronic pain syndromes, and inflammatory conditions. It is particularly beneficial for conditions such as multiple sclerosis, rheumatoid arthritis, Hashimoto’s thyroiditis, fibromyalgia, or irritable bowel syndrome. LDN helps reduce systemic inflammation, modulate immune responses, and improve symptom control, with potential neuroprotective and mood-enhancing effects.

medications.name: Testosterone Injectable
medications.description: An injectable form of testosterone replacement therapy that delivers consistent hormone levels.
medications.indication: A powerful, direct approach to optimizing testosterone for peak strength, vitality, and a leaner physique.

supplements.name: Aged Garlic Extract Formula
supplements.description: Kyolic Aged Garlic Extract Formula 104 supports cardiovascular health by helping to maintain healthy cholesterol levels and overall heart function. This formula combines aged garlic extract with naturally sourced lecithin for a potent, odorless supplement designed for daily wellness.
supplements.indication: Supports healthy cholesterol levels and promotes overall heart health with the power of aged garlic extract and lecithin.

supplements.name: Health Essential Bundle (Multi, Vitamin D, Omega)
supplements.description: Support your health with this essential trio: Vitamin D3 + K2 for strong bones, immunity, and mood balance, a high-quality multivitamin to fill nutritional gaps, and Omega-3s for heart, brain, and anti-inflammatory support. Optimize your wellness with these foundational nutrients!
supplements.indication: Designed to support bone strength, immune function, heart health, and overall vitality.

medications.name: DHEA
medications.description: A hormone produced by the adrenal glands. It serves as a precursor to sex hormones like testosterone and estrogen and counterbalances cortisol, the stress hormone.
medications.indication: Restores hormonal balance, boosts energy, mood, and sexual health. Enhances stress resilience, immunity, and overall well-being, essential for longevity and performance optimization.

medications.name: Glutathione
medications.description: Glutathione is a powerful antioxidant naturally produced in the body that plays a crucial role in detoxification, immune function, and cellular repair. It neutralizes harmful free radicals, reduces oxidative stress, and supports liver health, making it essential for overall wellness and anti-aging.
medications.indication: Glutathione helps brighten skin tone, reduce inflammation, and enhance recovery from physical stress. Widely studied for its benefits, it is a cornerstone of cellular defense and optimal health.

medications.name: NAD+
medications.description: NAD+ (Nicotinamide Adenine Dinucleotide) is a vital coenzyme found in every cell of the body that plays a central role in energy production, cellular repair, and mitochondrial function. It is essential for converting nutrients into ATP (cellular energy) and supports critical processes like DNA repair, oxidative stress regulation, and aging-related resilience. NAD+ levels naturally decline with age, stress, illness, and environmental exposure, which may contribute to fatigue, cognitive decline, metabolic issues, and neurodegeneration.
medications.indication: Supports cellular energy production, mitochondrial function, and healthy aging. It may be used to assist in the management of fatigue, cognitive decline, neurodegenerative conditions, detoxification, and metabolic dysfunction, particularly in individuals experiencing stress-related depletion, chronic illness, or age-related decline in NAD+ levels.

medications.name: Epitalon
medications.description: Epitalon (Epithalon) is a synthetic tetrapeptide (Ala-Glu-Asp-Gly) derived from Epithalamin, a natural peptide produced in the pineal gland. It has a role in regulating telomerase activity, promoting cellular longevity, and modulating circadian rhythms. Epitalon is considered a potential anti-aging compound due to its effects on telomere maintenance, oxidative stress reduction, and endocrine system regulation.
medications.indication: Epitalon has been studied for its ability to activate telomerase, an enzyme that maintains telomere length, potentially slowing cellular aging and promoting longevity.

medications.name: Glutathione
medications.description: Glutathione is a powerful antioxidant naturally produced in the body that plays a crucial role in detoxification, immune function, and cellular repair. It neutralizes harmful free radicals, reduces oxidative stress, and supports liver health, making it essential for overall wellness and anti-aging.
medications.indication: Glutathione helps brighten skin tone, reduce inflammation, and enhance recovery from physical stress. Widely studied for its benefits, it is a cornerstone of cellular defense and optimal health.

supplements.name: Health Essential Bundle (Multi, Vitamin D, Omega)
supplements.description: Support your health with this essential trio: Vitamin D3 + K2 for strong bones, immunity, and mood balance, a high-quality multivitamin to fill nutritional gaps, and Omega-3s for heart, brain, and anti-inflammatory support. Optimize your wellness with these foundational nutrients!
supplements.indication: Designed to support bone strength, immune function, heart health, and overall vitality.

supplements.name: Homocysteine Nutrients
supplements.description: Homocysteine Nutrients is a dietary supplement designed to support healthy homocysteine metabolism and optimal methylation. It combines bioactive B vitamins, such as L-methylfolate and methylcobalamin, with trimethylglycine (TMG) to promote cardiovascular and neurological health. This formula helps convert homocysteine to methionine, maintaining normal levels for improved function.
supplements.indication: High Homocysteine blood plasma levels, also supports cardiovascular and cognitive health by promoting the efficient metabolism of homocysteine, a key factor in reducing health risks.

supplements.name: Homocysteine Supreme
supplements.description: Formulated to support the efficient metabolism of homocysteine, an amino acid linked to cardiovascular and neurological health. It combines bioactive forms of folate (5-methyltetrahydrofolate), vitamin B6 (pyridoxal-5’-phosphate), vitamin B12 (methylcobalamin), and other synergistic nutrients to promote optimal homocysteine pathways.
supplements.indication: By maintaining healthy homocysteine levels, this supplement aids in the production of essential compounds like taurine, cysteine, norepinephrine, and dopamine, which are vital for detoxification, immune function, joint and cartilage health, and overall brain and cardiovascular wellness.

medications.name: 5-Amino 1MQ
medications.description: 5-Amino-1MQ is a small molecule peptide that acts as an inhibitor of the enzyme nicotinamide N-methyltransferase (NNMT), which plays a role in cellular metabolism and energy regulation. By inhibiting NNMT, 5-Amino-1MQ enhances NAD⁺ biosynthesis and improves mitochondrial function, contributing to increased energy expenditure and improved metabolic health.
medications.indication: Supports weight loss and improves metabolic function by inhibiting NNMT, enhancing fat burning, preserving lean muscle, and improving insulin sensitivity. It is useful in protocols for weight management, metabolic optimization, and cellular energy support.

medications.name: Compounded T3/T4 Thyroid Medication
medications.description: Compounded T3/T4 is a customized thyroid hormone medication containing a specific ratio of liothyronine (T3) and levothyroxine (T4), formulated by a compounding pharmacy to meet individual patient needs when commercially available options are not ideal.
medications.indication: Indicated for the treatment of hypothyroidism in patients requiring a personalized ratio of T3 and T4 to restore optimal thyroid function. It is beneficial for individuals who do not respond adequately to T4-only therapy, experience persistent hypothyroid symptoms, or need a formulation free of allergens or specific excipients.

medications.name: GHK-Cu Peptide Treatment
medications.description: GHK-Cu Peptide is a powerful tripeptide bonded with copper ions, known for its ability to stimulate collagen production, support tissue repair, and combat signs of aging. Backed by decades of scientific research, GHK-Cu is safe for all skin types and a key component in anti-aging and regenerative treatments.
medications.indication: Clinically researched, it improves skin elasticity, reduces wrinkles, balances pigmentation, and promotes hair follicle repair for thicker, healthier hair. Additionally, it accelerates wound healing, reduces inflammation, and strengthens antioxidant defenses, making it ideal for post-procedure recovery and calming irritated skin.

medications.name: Selank
medications.description: A synthetic peptide developed as an analog of the naturally occurring immunomodulatory peptide tuftsin. Selank exhibits pronounced anxiolytic (anti-anxiety) effects without the sedative and dependency side effects commonly associated with traditional tranquilizers. Additionally, it has demonstrated nootropic properties, enhancing cognitive functions such as memory and learning.
medications.indication: Selank is used to support anxiety relief, cognitive enhancement, and stress management. This synthetic peptide promotes a calming effect without sedation, improves memory and focus, and helps regulate the body's stress response for overall mental well-being.

medications.name: Cycle vs Constant
medications.description:
Cycle: Selank Glutathione

Constant: Progesterone, DHEA, Testosterone.

We may not start with Glutathione, because Homocysteine has antioxidant effects. Determine its need as we progress unless you want to start with both.

Costs:
Testosterone 99/year
Progesterone 45/month
DHEA 45/month
Selank 379/2-4 month
Glutathione 99/5 months

medications.name: Selank
medications.description: A synthetic peptide developed as an analog of the naturally occurring immunomodulatory peptide tuftsin. Selank exhibits pronounced anxiolytic (anti-anxiety) effects without the sedative and dependency side effects commonly associated with traditional tranquilizers. Additionally, it has demonstrated nootropic properties, enhancing cognitive functions such as memory and learning.
medications.indication: Selank is used to support anxiety relief, cognitive enhancement, and stress management. This synthetic peptide promotes a calming effect without sedation, improves memory and focus, and helps regulate the body's stress response for overall mental well-being.

medications.name: Testosterone Injectable
medications.description: An injectable form of testosterone replacement therapy that delivers consistent hormone levels.
medications.indication: A powerful, direct approach to optimizing testosterone for peak strength, vitality, and a leaner physique.

supplements.name: Cycle vs Constant
supplements.description:
Cycle: Aged Garlic, Homocysteine, 

Constant: Thyroid Support, Cortisol Calm (Adaptogens)

Costs:
Aged Garlic 61/6 months
Thyroid Support 48/2months
Homocysteine 56/2 months
Cortisol calm 120/2 months

supplements.name: Aged Garlic Extract Formula
supplements.description: Kyolic Aged Garlic Extract Formula 104 supports cardiovascular health by helping to maintain healthy cholesterol levels and overall heart function. This formula combines aged garlic extract with naturally sourced lecithin for a potent, odorless supplement designed for daily wellness.
supplements.indication: Supports healthy cholesterol levels and promotes overall heart health with the power of aged garlic extract and lecithin.

supplements.name: Cortisol Calm
supplements.description: A supplement designed to support adrenal health and stress management by balancing cortisol levels.
supplements.indication: A premium adaptogen blend designed to regulate cortisol levels and support a balanced stress response.

supplements.name: Homocysteine Supreme
supplements.description: Formulated to support the efficient metabolism of homocysteine, an amino acid linked to cardiovascular and neurological health. It combines bioactive forms of folate (5-methyltetrahydrofolate), vitamin B6 (pyridoxal-5’-phosphate), vitamin B12 (methylcobalamin), and other synergistic nutrients to promote optimal homocysteine pathways.
supplements.indication: By maintaining healthy homocysteine levels, this supplement aids in the production of essential compounds like taurine, cysteine, norepinephrine, and dopamine, which are vital for detoxification, immune function, joint and cartilage health, and overall brain and cardiovascular wellness.

supplements.name: Thyroid Support Bundle
supplements.description: A comprehensive supplement package designed to support thyroid function.
supplements.indication: Optimize your thyroid function with our Thyroid Support Bundle, featuring Selenium, D3 Liquid, and more.

medications.name: Cycle vs Constant
medications.description:
Cycle: Selank Glutathione

Constant: Progesterone, DHEA, Testosterone.

We may not start with Glutathione, because Homocysteine has antioxidant effects. Determine its need as we progress unless you want to start with both.

Costs:
Testosterone 99/year
Progesterone 45/month
DHEA 45/month
Selank 379/2-4 month
Glutathione 99/5 months

medications.name: DHEA
medications.description: A hormone produced by the adrenal glands. It serves as a precursor to sex hormones like testosterone and estrogen and counterbalances cortisol, the stress hormone.
medications.indication: Restores hormonal balance, boosts energy, mood, and sexual health. Enhances stress resilience, immunity, and overall well-being, essential for longevity and performance optimization.

medications.name: Glutathione
medications.description: Glutathione is a powerful antioxidant naturally produced in the body that plays a crucial role in detoxification, immune function, and cellular repair. It neutralizes harmful free radicals, reduces oxidative stress, and supports liver health, making it essential for overall wellness and anti-aging.
medications.indication: Glutathione helps brighten skin tone, reduce inflammation, and enhance recovery from physical stress. Widely studied for its benefits, it is a cornerstone of cellular defense and optimal health.

medications.name: Progesterone
medications.description: Progesterone Therapy provides a personalized solution to support hormonal balance, improve mood, and enhance overall well-being.
medications.indication: Progesterone therapy helps regulate cycles, reduce stress, and promote optimal hormonal health.

medications.name: Selank
medications.description: A synthetic peptide developed as an analog of the naturally occurring immunomodulatory peptide tuftsin. Selank exhibits pronounced anxiolytic (anti-anxiety) effects without the sedative and dependency side effects commonly associated with traditional tranquilizers. Additionally, it has demonstrated nootropic properties, enhancing cognitive functions such as memory and learning.
medications.indication: Selank is used to support anxiety relief, cognitive enhancement, and stress management. This synthetic peptide promotes a calming effect without sedation, improves memory and focus, and helps regulate the body's stress response for overall mental well-being.
